Articles.Content:
Ehm.... Maybe I pressed a wrong button.

But I can't insert pictures anymore.

The top line in the editing window is gone...

Edited August 30, 2013 by Tokay Gris
Go to Settings > General Settings > Scroll down to: Miscellaneous Options. Make sure the Message Editor Interface isn't set to "Basic Editor - A simple text box"
Did that. Tried "Standard" and "Enhanced.Looks exactly the same.A blank Window to type in, no tools.I THINK I can post images using the code.Hm.....
And another thing... It completely eats up my paragraphs. Hm.... might be a problem on my side after all.I'll try another computer...Hm... but it didn't do this on my first post.
Did you click the "Go Advanced" button on the bottom left?

Yep, did that.

Same thing, except there is a title line.

EDIT: Ok, it doesn't eat the paragraphs anymore. That is something.

And another test.

It is the same on another computer...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/21-The-Forum-Forum

Several threads there regarding similar issues, have a read.

I will mark it "answered", although it isn't, really.

Just that it seems to be a known bug.
